properties.title: Melati - Java SQL Website Development Engine
properties.author: Tim Pizey
properties.keywords: Persistence, Java, SQL, Database, Templates, Object Relational Mapping, Objects, Object Oriented, J2EE replacement

section.name: Licence Info
section.p: We would like melati to be used by as many people as possible. If licencing issues are going to stop you using Melati, please let us know on the mailing lists and we will make every effort to accomodate you.
section.pre: /* * Melati is free software; Permission is granted to copy, distribute * and/or modify this software under the terms either: * * a) the GNU General Public License as published by the * Free Software Foundation; * either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. * * or * * b) any version of the Melati Software License. * * * The GNU General Public License version 2 is included * in this release, please read the file LICENSE-GPL.txt. * It is also available at http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.txt. * * The Melati Software License is compatible with * the Apache Software Foundation's Apache Software Licence, * please read the file LICENSE-MSL.txt. * */
